duties_responsibilities.duty: Create user-centered designs by understanding customer needs, business requirements, and user insights.
Develop and implement service design strategies to enhance user experience across web and mobile platforms.
Drive interaction design and visual/UI design processes to ensure intuitive and aesthetically pleasing digital interfaces.
Architect information structures and navigation flows to optimize user interaction and information access.
Utilize strategic storytelling frameworks and diagramming techniques to communicate design concepts and ideas effectively.
Proficiently use Sketch and Photoshop to prototype, iterate, and finalize design solutions.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in User Experience Design, Interaction Design, Graphic Design, or related field (Master's preferred)
